content: join the tunisian crochet train by making yourself and a friend a tunisian lattice top you only need to know how to make the tunisian double_crochet yarn over and single_crochet to make this perfect summertime garment it is styled with positive ease for a breezy look but easy to change the length for the perfect length pattern includes photos color coding for each size and a stitch chart pattern requires a straight or cabled tunisian hook to fit bust x-small 28-31 small 32-35 medium 36-39 large 40-43 x-large 44-47 2x-large 48-51 3x-large 52-55 4x-large 56-59 5x-large 60-64 i invite you to join confidently crochet with creations by courtney on facebook for crochet alongs tutorials stitch challenges and more take me there http //www facebook com/groups/creationsbycourt this pattern is not to be duplicated or resold and not to be reproduced commercially you may sell finished products on etsy at farmers markets and craft fairs but please credit creations by courtney as the pattern s author
